It's so easy to FLY away from Winter!
Yes, your round-trip ticket to most of the warm, sunny places
shown above is less than $200. In some cases, like Bermuda,
Havana, Nassau and Mexico City, your round-trip by Clipper*
costs less than $100! (Fares shown on map are for round trip
and are subject to tax.)
Winter vacations by Clipper are definitely not expensive.
And more and more people are discovering that a winter vaca-
tion pays big dividends in increased health and efficiency!
Ask about popular Pan Am Holidays to these lands. Special
Holiday prices (not shown) include Clipper fare, hotels, sight-seeing,
meals. It's the thrifty, carefree way to go!
Call your Travel Agent or nearest Pan American office today.
PAN AMERICAN
No ice and snow here! All through the West Indies you'll find beaches like this
—easy to reach by Clipper —where December and January temperatures average 78.
